feature.name: Range
feature.description: Difference in semitones between the highest and lowest pitches.

feature.name: Vibrato Prevalence
feature.description: Number of pitched notes that have associated MIDI Pitch Bend messages change direction at least twice in connection with the note in question, divided by the total number of pitched Note Ons in the piece.

feature.name: Melodic Octaves
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that are octaves.
